io.github.samwright.framework.controller

Interface TopController

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ModelController
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    TopContainerController

    public interface TopController
extends ModelController
    The top controller, which is the only type of controller that a TopProcessor can have.

    • Method Summary

      void handleException(Exception e)

      • Methods inherited from interface io.github.samwright.framework.controller.ModelController

    • Method Detail

      • handleException

        void handleException(Exception e)
        If the controlled TopProcessor catches an exception, it will pass it here to be properly handled (eg. by showing the exception in a modal popup window).
        Parameters:
        e - the exception thrown whilst processing.
